question.title: Sort query parameter has no effect when JSON property naming strategy is UpperCamelCase
question.body:
I use Spring Data REST to expose CRUD endpoints for a JpaRepository. The endpoint on the collection resource provides page, size and sort query parameters. The issue is that sorting doesn't work for some properties.

public interface MyRepository extends JpaRepository<MyEntity, String> { }

@Entity
@Data
public class MyEntity {
    @Id
    String id;

    String foo;

    @JsonProperty("BAR")
    String bar;

    @JsonProperty("Baz")
    String baz;
}

Sorting works for:

  • http://localhost:8080/api/myEntities?page=0&size=20&sort=foo
  • http://localhost:8080/api/myEntities?page=0&size=20&sort=BAR

But this doesn't work:

  • http://localhost:8080/api/myEntities?page=0&size=20&sort=Baz

How can I use JsonNaming=UpperCamelCaseStrategy for my properties and their sort query parameters?
